attributes.action: Issue A Coronation Medal To All Serving Members Of The Armed Forces
attributes.additional_details: As a member of the armed forces I believe that , as for centuries before now. A coronation medal should be issued to all serving members of the armed forces who have completed at least five years of service. I believe this because of the special relationship the Royal family has two of the armed forces in recognition of the service to the Monarch throughout the rein.
attributes.background: I would like the government to agree to issuing a coronation medal to all serving members of the armed forces To recognise the coronation of King Charles in 2023.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637397
